title: Seidio BD4-HKR4MTBNC CONVERT Combo for Motorola Droid Bionic - Combo Pack - Retail Packaging - Black
features: Combo for the Motorola Droid Bionic includes the Ultimate Screen Guard, SURFACE Case, rugged skin and skeleton and the CONVERT Holster
Ultimate Screen Guard protects your screen without the use of messy adhesives
SURFACE case is sleek, provides scratch protection and has precision cut-outs for ports and controls; case can be used alone
Rugged Skin and Skeleton fit over the Surface case for added protection and ports and camera are protected but functional
CONVERT Holster locks, swivels and fits up to a 2'' duty or utility belt
description: True versatility emerges in the cutting-edge design of the Seidio CONVERT. An industry-first, the CONVERT features two smartphone cases in one - a sleek case for everyday protection and a heavy-duty case for the demands of the outdoors or rugged professions. On top of the protection offered by the case, your Motorola Droid Bionic will remain secure thanks to our patented locking CONVERT holster that fits a duty or utility belt up to 2" wide.
